text.43: Unless indicated otherwise, accents have been dropped in order

text.53: kim āha bandhaṇaṃ vīro | kiṃ vā jāṇaṃ tiuai
text.54: cittamantam acittaṃ vā | parigijjha kisām avi /
text.55: annaṃ vā aṇujāṇāi | evaṃ dukkhā na muccaī
text.58: jassiṃ kule samuppanne | jehiṃ vā saṃvase nare /
text.59: mamāi luppaī bāle | anne annehi mucchie
text.60: vittaṃ soyariyā ceva | savvam eyaṃ na tāṇai /
text.61: saṃkhāe jīviyaṃ cevaṃ | kammuṇā u tiuai
text.65: puḍhavī āu teū vā | vāu āgāsapañcamā
text.66: ee pañca mahabbhūyā | tebbho ego tti āhiyā /
text.67: aha tesiṃ viṇāseṇaṃ | viṇāso hoi dehiṇo
text.68: jahā ya puḍhavīthūbhe | ege nāṇāhi dīsai /
text.69: evaṃ bho kasiṇe loe | vinnū nāṇāhi dīsai
text.70: evam ege tti jampanti | mandā ārambhanissiyā /
text.71: ege kiccā sayaṃ pāvaṃ | tivvaṃ dukkhaṃ niyacchai
text.72: patteyaṃ kasiṇe āyā | je bālā je ya paṇḍiyā /
text.73: santi piccā na te santi | natthi sattovavāiyā
text.74: natthi puṇṇe va pāve vā | natthi loe io vare /
text.76: kuvvaṃ ca kārayaṃ ceva | savvaṃ kuvvaṃ na vijjaī /
text.77: evaṃ akārao appā | evaṃ te u pagabbhiyā
text.78: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | loe tesiṃ kao siyā /
text.79: tamāo te tamaṃ janti | mandā ārambhanissiyā
text.81: āya chaṭhā puṇo āhu | āyā loge ya sāsae
text.82: duhao na viṇassanti | no ya uppajjae asaṃ /
text.83: savve vi savvahā bhāvā | niyattībhāvam āgayā
text.84: pañca khandhe vayantege | bālā u khaṇajoiṇo /
text.85: anno aṇanno nevāhu | heuyaṃ ca aheuyaṃ
text.86: puḍhavī āu teū ya | tahā vāū ya egao /
text.87: cattāri dhāuṇo rūvaṃ | evam āhaṃsu āvare
text.88: agāram āvasantā vi | araṇṇā vā vi pavvayā /
text.90: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā /
text.91: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te ohaṃtarāhiyā
text.92: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā /
text.93: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te saṃsārapāragā
text.94: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā /
text.95: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te gabbhassa pāragā
text.96: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā /
text.97: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te jammassa pāragā
text.98: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā /
text.99: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te dukkhassa pāragā
text.100: te nāvi saṃdhiṃ naccā -aṃ | na te dhammaviū jaṇā ũ/
text.101: je te u vāiṇo evaṃ | na te mārassa pāragā
text.105: nāyaputte mahāvīre | evam āha jiṇuttame  tti bemi ||
text.108: āghāyaṃ puṇa egesiṃ | uvavannā puḍho jiyā /
text.109: vedayanti suhaṃ dukkhaṃ | adu vā luppanti ṭhāṇao
text.110: na taṃ sayaṃkaḍaṃ dukkhaṃ | kao annakaḍaṃ ca -aṃ /
text.111: suhaṃ vā jai vā dukkhaṃ | sehiyaṃ vā asehiyaṃ
text.112: sayaṃkaḍaṃ na annehiṃ | vedayanti puḍho jiyā /
text.116: evam ege u pāsatthā | te bhujjo vippagabbhiyā /
text.117: evaṃ uvaṭhiyā santā | na te dukkhavimokkhagā
text.118: javiṇo migā jahā santā | pariyāṇeṇa vajjiyā /
text.122: aha taṃ pavejja bajjhaṃ | ahe bajjhassa vā vae /
text.123: muccejja payapāsāo | taṃ tu mande na dehaī
text.125: sa baddhe payapāseṇaṃ | tattha ghāyaṃ niyacchai
text.126: evaṃ tu samaṇā ege | micchadiṭhī aṇāriyā /
text.128: dhammapannavaṇā jā sā | taṃ tu saṅkanti mūḍhagā /
text.131: appattiyaṃ akammaṃse | eyam aṭhaṃ mige cue
text.133: migā vā pāsabaddhā te | ghāyam essanti -antaso
text.134: māhaṇā samaṇā ege | savve nāṇaṃ sayaṃ vae /
text.135: savvaloge vi je pāṇā | na te jāṇanti kiṃcaṇa
text.137: na heuṃ se viyāṇāi | bhāsiyaṃ taṇubhāsae
text.138: evam annāṇiyā nāṇaṃ | vayantā vi sayaṃ sayaṃ /
text.139: nicchayatthaṃ na jāṇanti | milakkhu vva abohiyā
text.141: appaṇo ya paraṃ nālaṃ | kuto annāṇusāsiuṃ
text.142: vaṇe mūḍhe jahā jantū | mūḍhe neyāṇugāmie /
text.143: do vi ee akoviyā | tivvaṃ soyaṃ niyacchaī
text.144: andho andhaṃ pahaṃ nento | dūram addhāṇa gacchai /
text.145: āvajje uppahaṃ jantū | adu vā panthāṇugāmie
text.146: evam ege niyāgaṭhī | dhammam ārāhagā vayaṃ /
text.147: adu vā ahammam āvajje | na te savvajjuyaṃ vae
text.148: evam ege viyakkāhiṃ | no annaṃ pajjuvāsiyā /
text.149: appaṇo ya viyakkāhiṃ | ayamañjū hi dummaī
text.151: dukkhaṃ te nāituenti | sauṇī pañjaraṃ jahā
text.152: sayaṃ sayaṃ pasaṃsantā | garahantā paraṃ vayaṃ /
text.153: je u tattha viussanti | saṃsāraṃ te viussiyā
text.156: jāṇaṃ kāeṇaṇāuī | avuho jaṃ ca hiṃsai /
text.157: puṭho saṃveyai paraṃ | aviyattaṃ khu sāvajjaṃ
text.158: santime tau āyāṇā | jehiṃ kīrai pāvagaṃ /
text.159: abhikammā ya pesā ya | maṇasā aṇujāṇiyā
text.160: ee u tau āyāṇā | jehiṃ kīrai pāvagaṃ /
text.164: maṇasā je padussanti | cittaṃ tesiṃ na vijjai /
text.165: aṇavajjam atahaṃ tesiṃ | na te saṃvuḍacāriṇo
text.167: saraṇaṃ ti mannamāṇā | sevantī pāvagaṃ jaṇā
text.169: icchaī pāram āgantuṃ | antarā ya visīyaī
text.170: evaṃ tu samaṇā ege | micchadiṭhī aṇāriyā /
text.171: saṃsārapārakaṃkhī te | saṃsāraṃ aṇupariyaanti  tti bemi ||
text.178: udagassa pahāveṇaṃ | sukkaṃ sigghaṃ tam enti u /
text.179: ḍhaṅkehi ya kaṅkehi ya | āmisatthehi te duhī
text.183: devautte ayaṃ loe | bambhautte i āvare
text.186: sayaṃbhuṇā kaḍe loe | ii vuttaṃ mahesiṇā /
text.187: māreṇa saṃthuyā māyā | teṇa loe asāsae
text.188: māhaṇā samaṇā ege | āha aṇḍakaḍe jae /
text.189: aso tattam akāsī ya | ayāṇantā musaṃ vae
text.190: saehiṃ pariyāehiṃ | logaṃ būyā kaḍe tti ya /
text.191: tattaṃ te na viyāṇanti | na viṇāsī kayāi vi
text.196: iha saṃvuḍe muṇī jāe | pacchā hoi apāvae /
text.197: viyaḍambu jahā bhujjo | nīrayaṃ sarayaṃ tahā
text.199: puḍho pāvāuyā savve | akkhāyāro sayaṃ sayaṃ
text.200: sae sae uvaṭhāṇe | siddhim eva na annahā /
text.202: siddhā ya te arogā ya | ihamegesimāhiyaṃ /
text.203: siddhim eva puro kāuṃ | sāsae gaḍhiyā narā
text.205: kappakālam uvajjanti | ṭhāṇā āsurakibbisiya  tti bemi ||
text.208: ee jiyā bho na saraṇaṃ | bālā paṇḍiyamāṇiṇo /
text.210: taṃ ca bhikkhū parinnāya | viyaṃ tesu na mucchae /
text.214: kaḍesu ghāsam esejjā | viū dattesaṇaṃ care /
text.218: aṇante niie loe | sāsae na viṇassaī /
text.219: antavaṃ niie loe | ii dhīro tipāsaī
text.222: je kei tasā pāṇā | ciṭhanti adu thāvarā /
text.223: pariyāe atthi se añjū | jeṇa te tasathāvarā
text.224: urālaṃ jagao jogaṃ | vivajjāsaṃ palenti ya /
text.225: savve akkantadukkhā ya | ao savve ahiṃsiyā
text.226: eyaṃ khu nāṇiṇo sāraṃ | jaṃ na hiṃsai kiṃcaṇa /
text.228: vusie ya vigayagehī | āyāṇaṃ samma rakkhae /
text.230: eehiṃ tihi ṭhāṇehiṃ | saṃjae sayayaṃ muṇī /
text.231: ukkasaṃ jalaṇaṃ nūmaṃ | majjhatthaṃ ca vigiñcae
text.233: siehi asie bhikkhū | āmokkhāe parivvaejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.236: saṃbujjhaha kiṃ na bujjhaha | saṃbohī khalu pecca dullahā /
text.237: no hūvaṇamanti rāiyo | no sulabhaṃ puṇarāvi jīviyaṃ
text.238: ḍaharā buḍḍhā ya pāsaha | gabbhatthā vi cayanti māṇavā /
text.239: seṇe jaha vaayaṃ hare | evaṃ āukhayammi tuaī
text.240: māyāhi piyāhi luppaī | no sulahā sugaī ya peccao /
text.241: eyāi bhayāi pehiyā | ārambhā viramejja suvvae
text.242: jam iṇaṃ jagaī puḍho jagā | kammehiṃ luppanti pāṇiṇo /
text.243: sayam eva kaḍehi gāhaī | no tassa muccejjapuṭhayaṃ
text.245: rāyā naraseṭhimāhaṇā | ṭhāṇā te vi cayanti dukkhiyā
text.246: kāmehi ya saṃthavehi gidhdā | kammasahā kāleṇa jantavo /
text.247: tāle jaha bandhaṇaccue | evaṃ āyukhayammi tuaī
text.248: je yāvi bahussue siyā | dhammiya māhaṇa bhikkhue siyā /
text.249: abhinūmakaḍehi mucchie | tivvaṃ te kammehi kiccaī
text.250: aha pāsa vivegamuṭhie | avitiṇṇe iha bhāsaī dhuvaṃ /
text.251: nāhisi āraṃ kao paraṃ | vehāse kammehi kiccaī
text.252: jai vi ya nagiṇe kise care | jai vi ya bhuñjiya māsamantaso /
text.253: je iha māyāhi mijjaī | āgantā gabbhāya -antaso
text.255: sannā iha kāmamucchiyā | mohaṃ janti narā asaṃvuḍā
text.256: jayayaṃ viharāhi jogavaṃ | aṇupāṇā panthā duruttarā /
text.259: pāṇe na haṇanti savvaso | pāvāo virayābhinivvuḍā
text.260: na vi tā aham eva luppae | luppantī logaṃsi pāṇiṇo /
text.261: evaṃ sahiehi pāsae | anihe se puṭhe hiyāsae
text.262: dhuṇiyā kuliyaṃ va levavaṃ | kisae deham aṇāsaṇā iha /
text.264: sauṇī jaha paṃsuguṇḍiyā | vihuṇiya dhaṃsayaī siyaṃ rayaṃ /
text.265: evaṃ daviovahāṇavaṃ | kammaṃ khavai tavassi māhaṇe
text.266: uṭhiyam aṇagāram esaṇaṃ | samaṇaṃ ṭhāṇaṭhiyaṃ tavassiṇaṃ /
text.267: ḍaharā vuḍḍhā ya patthae | avi susso na ya taṃ labhejja no
text.268: jai kāluṇiyāṇi kāsiyā | jai royanti ya puttakāraṇā /
text.269: daviyaṃ bhikkhū samuṭhiyaṃ | no labbhanti na saṃṭhavittave
text.270: jai vi ya kāmehi lāviyā | jai nejjāhi -a bandhiuṃ gharaṃ /
text.271: jai jīviya nāvakaṅkhae | no labbhanti na saṃṭhavittae
text.272: sehanti ya -aṃ mamāiṇo | māya piyā ya suyā ya bhāriyā /
text.273: posāhi -a pāsao tumaṃ | loga paraṃ pi jahāsi posaṇo
text.274: anne annehi mucchiyā | mohaṃ janti narā asaṃvuḍā /
text.275: visamaṃ visamehi gāhiyā | te pāvehi puṇo pagabbhiyā
text.276: tamhā davi ikkha paṇḍie | pāvāo virae bhinivvuḍe /
text.277: paṇae vīraṃ mahāvihiṃ | siddhipahaṃ neyāuyaṃ dhuvaṃ
text.279: ciccā vittaṃ ca nāyao | ārambhaṃ ca susaṃvuḍaṃ care  tti bemi ||
text.282: taya saṃ va jahāi se rayaṃ | ii saṃkhāya muṇī na majjaī /
text.284: jo paribhavaī paraṃ jaṇaṃ | saṃsāre parivattaī mahaṃ /
text.285: adu iṃkhiṇiyā u pāviyā | ii saṃkhāya muṇī na majjaī
text.286: je yāvi aṇāyage siyā | je vi ya pesagapesage siyā /
text.287: je moṇapayaṃ uvaṭhie | no lajje samayaṃ sayā care
text.288: sama annayarammi saṃjame | saṃsuddhe samaṇe parivvae /
text.289: je āvakahā samāhie | davie kālam akāsi paṇḍie
text.290: dūraṃ aṇupassiyā muṇī | tīyaṃ dhammam aṇāgayaṃ tahā /
text.291: puṭhe pharusehi māhaṇe | avi haṇṇū samayammi rīyai
text.292: pannasamatte sayā jae | samatādhammam udāhare muṇī /
text.293: suhume u sayā alūsae | no kujjhe no māṇi māhaṇe
text.295: harae va sayā aṇāvile | dhammaṃ pādurakāsi kāsavaṃ
text.296: bahave pāṇā puḍho siyā | patteyaṃ samayaṃ samīhiyā /
text.297: je moṇapayaṃ uvaṭhie | viraiṃ tattha akāsi paṇḍie
text.298: dhammassa ya pārage muṇī | ārambhassa ya antae ṭhie /
text.299: soyanti ya -aṃ mamāiṇo | no labbhanti niyaṃ pariggahaṃ
text.300: ihaloga duhāvahaṃ viū | paraloge ya duhaṃ duhāvahaṃ /
text.301: viddhaṃsaṇadhammameva taṃ | ii vijjaṃ ko gāramāvase
text.302: mahayaṃ paligova jāṇiyā | jā vi ya vaṃdaṇapūyaṇā ihaṃ /
text.303: suhume salle duruddhare | viumaṃtā payahijja saṃthavaṃ
text.304: ega cara ṭhāṇamāsaṇe | sayaṇe ega samāhie siyā /
text.306: no pīhe na yāvapaṃguṇe | dāraṃ sunnagharassa saṃjae /
text.307: puṭhe na udāhare vayaṃ | na samucche no saṃthare taṇaṃ
text.309: caragā adu vā vi bheravā | adu vā tattha sarīsivā siyā
text.310: tiriyā maṇuyā ya divvagā | uvasaggā tivihā hiyāsiyā /
text.312: no abhikaṃkhejja jīviyaṃ | no vi ya pūyaṇapatthaṇe siyā /
text.315: sāmāiyam āhu tassa jaṃ | jo appāṇa bhae na daṃsae
text.317: saṃsagge asāhu rāihiṃ | asamāhī u tahāgayassa vi
text.319: aṭhe parihāyaī bahū | ahigaraṇaṃ na karejja paṇḍie
text.321: sāmāiyam āhu tassa jaṃ | jo gihimatte 'saṇaṃ na bhuñjaī
text.322: na ya saṃkhayam āhu jīviyaṃ | taha vi ya bālajaṇo pagabbhaī /
text.323: bāle pāvehi mijjaī | ii saṃkhāya muṇī na majjaī
text.324: chaṃdeṇa pale imā payā | bahumāyā moheṇa pāvuḍā /
text.325: viyaḍeṇa palenti māhaṇe | sīuṇhaṃ vayasā hiyāsae
text.326: kujae aparājie jahā | akkhehiṃ kusalehi dīvayaṃ /
text.327: kaḍameva gahāya no kaliṃ | no tīyaṃ no ceva dāvaraṃ
text.328: evaṃ logammi tāiṇā | buie je dhamme aṇuttare /
text.329: taṃ giṇha hiyaṃ ti uttamaṃ | kaḍamiva sesa vahāya paṇḍie
text.330: uttara maṇuyāṇa ahiyā | gāmadhamma ii me aṇussuyaṃ /
text.332: je eya caranti āhiyaṃ | nāeṇaṃ mahayā mahesiṇā /
text.333: te uṭhiya te samuṭhiyā | annonnaṃ sārenti dhammao
text.334: mā peha purā paṇāmae | abhikaṃkhe uvahiṃ dhuṇittae /
text.335: ja dūmaṇa tehi no nayā | te jāṇanti samāhimāhiyaṃ
text.336: no kāhie hojja saṃjae | pāsaṇie na ya saṃpasārae /
text.337: naccā dhammaṃ aṇuttaraṃ | kayakirie na yāvi māmae
text.338: channaṃ ca pasaṃsa no kare | na ya ukkosa pagāsa māhaṇe /
text.339: tesiṃ suvivegamāhie | paṇayā jehi sujosiyaṃ dhuvaṃ
text.341: viharejja samāhiiṃdie | attahiyaṃ khu duheṇa labbhai
text.342: na hi nūṇa purā aṇussuyaṃ | adu vā taṃ taha no samuṭhiyaṃ /
text.344: evaṃ mattā mahantaraṃ | dhammam iṇaṃ sahiyā bahū jaṇā /
text.345: guruṇo chaṃdāṇuvattagā | virayā tiṇṇa mahoghamāhiyaṃ  ti bemi ||
text.348: saṃvuḍakammassa bhikkhuṇo | jaṃ dukkhaṃ puṭhaṃ abohie /
text.349: taṃ saṃjamao 'vacijjaī | maraṇaṃ hecca vayanti paṇḍiyā
text.351: tamhā uḍḍhaṃ ti pāsahā | adakkhu kāmāiṃ rogavaṃ
text.352: aggaṃ vaṇiehi āhiyaṃ | dhārentī rāiṇiyā ihaṃ /
text.353: evaṃ paramā mahavvayā | akkhāyā u sarāibhoyaṇā
text.354: je iha sāyāṇugā narā | ajjhovavannā kāmehi mucchiyā /
text.355: kivaṇeṇa samaṃ pagabbhiyā | na vi jāṇanti samāhimāhiyaṃ
text.356: vāheṇa jahā va vicchae | abale hoi gavaṃ pacoie /
text.357: se antaso appathāmae | nāivahe abale visīyai
text.358: evaṃ kāmesaṇa viū | ajja sue payahejja saṃthavaṃ /
text.359: kāmī kāme na kāmae | laddhe vā vi aladdha kaṇhuī
text.360: mā paccha asādhutā bhave | accehī aṇusāsa appagaṃ /
text.361: ahiyaṃ ca asāhu soyaī | se thaṇaī paridevaī bahuṃ
text.362: iha jīviyam eva pāsahā | taruṇe vā sasayassa tuaī /
text.363: ittaravāse ya bujjhaha | giddha narā kāmesu mucchiyā
text.365: gantā te pāvalogayaṃ | cirarāyaṃ āsuriyaṃ disaṃ
text.366: na ya saṃkhayam āhu jīviyaṃ | taha vi ya bālajaṇo pagabbhaī /
text.367: paccuppanneṇa kāriyaṃ | ko daṭhuṃ paralogam āgae
text.369: haṃdi hu suniruddhadaṃsaṇe | mohaṇieṇa kaḍeṇa kammuṇā
text.370: dukkhī mohe puṇo puṇo | nivvindejja silogapūyaṇaṃ /
text.371: evaṃ sahie hipāsae | āyatulaṃ pāṇehi saṃjae
text.372: gāraṃ pi ya āvase nare | aṇupuvvaṃ pāṇehi saṃjae /
text.373: samatā savvattha suvvae | devāṇaṃ gacche salogayaṃ
text.377: gutte jutte sayā jae | āyapare paramāyataṭhie
text.378: vittaṃ pasavo ya nāio | taṃ bāle saraṇaṃ ti mannaī /
text.379: ee mama tesu vī ahaṃ | no tāṇaṃ saraṇaṃ na vijjaī
text.380: abbhāgamiyammi vā duhe | ahavā ukkamie bhavantie /
text.381: egassa gaī ya āgaī | vidumantā saraṇaṃ na mannaī
text.384: iṇameva khaṇaṃ viyāṇiyā | no sulabhaṃ bohiṃ ca āhiyaṃ /
text.385: evaṃ sahie hipāsae | āha jiṇe iṇam eva sesagā
text.386: abhaviṃsu purā vi bhikkhuvo | āesā vi bhavanti suvvayā /
text.387: eyāiṃ guṇāiṃ āhu te | kāsavassa aṇudhammacāriṇo
text.388: tiviheṇa vi pāṇa mā haṇe | āyahie aṇiyāṇa saṃvuḍe /
text.389: evaṃ siddhā aṇantaso | saṃpai je ya aṇāgayāvare
text.391: (arahā nāyaputte | bhagavaṃ vesālie viyāhie  tti bemi ||)
text.394: sūraṃ mannai appāṇaṃ | jāva jeyaṃ na passaī /
text.397: māyā puttaṃ na jāṇāi | jeeṇa parivicchae
text.399: sūraṃ mannai appāṇaṃ | jāva lūhaṃ na sevae
text.401: tattha mandā visīyanti | rajjahīṇā va khattiyā
text.403: tattha mandā visīyanti | macchā appodae jahā
text.406: ee sadde acāyantā | gāmesu nagaresu vā /
text.407: tattha mandā visīyanti | saṃgāmammi va bhīruyā
text.408: appege khudhiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ | suṇī ḍaṃsai lūsae /
text.409: tattha mandā visīyanti | teupuṭhā va pāṇiṇo
text.415: tamāo te tamaṃ janti | mandā moheṇa pāvuḍā
text.417: na me diṭhe pare loe | jai paraṃ maraṇaṃ siyā
text.419: tattha mandā visīyanti | macchā viṭhā va keyaṇe
text.422: appege paliyantesiṃ | cāro coro tti suvvayaṃ /
text.424: tattha daṇḍeṇa saṃvīte | muṭhiṇā adu phaleṇa vā /
text.425: nāīṇaṃ saraī bāle | itthī vā kuddhagāmiṇī
text.426: ee bho kasiṇā phāsā | pharusā durahiyāsayā /
text.427: hatthī vā sarasaṃvittā | kīvāvasa gayā gihaṃ  ti bemi ||
text.430: ahime suhumā saṃgā | bhikkhūṇaṃ je duruttarā /
text.431: jattha ege visīyanti | na cayanti javittae
text.433: posa -e tāya puṭho si | kassa tāya jahāsi -e
text.434: piyā te therao tāya | sasā te khuḍḍiyā imā /
text.435: bhāyaro te sagā tāya | soyarā kiṃ jahāsi -e
text.436: māyaraṃ piyaraṃ posa | evaṃ logo bhavissai /
text.437: evaṃ khu loiyaṃ tāya | je pālenti ya māyaraṃ
text.438: uttarā mahurullāvā | puttā te tāya khuḍḍayā /
text.439: bhāriyā te navā tāya | mā sā annaṃ jaṇaṃ game
text.440: ehi tāya gharaṃ jāmo | mā ya kamme sahā vayaṃ /
text.441: biiyaṃ pi tāya pāsāmo | jāmu tāva sayaṃ gihaṃ
text.442: gantuṃ tāya puṇo gacche | na teṇāsamaṇo siyā /
text.443: akāmagaṃ parikkammaṃ | ko te vārium arihai
text.444: jaṃ kiṃci aṇagaṃ tāya | taṃ pi savvaṃ samīkayaṃ /
text.445: hiraṇṇaṃ vavahārāi | taṃ pi dāhāmu te vayaṃ
text.448: jahā rukkhaṃ vaṇe jāyaṃ | māluyā paḍibandhai /
text.450: vibaddho nāisaṃgehiṃ | hatthī vā vi navaggahe /
text.451: piṭhao parisappanti | suya go vva adūrae
text.452: ee saṃgā maṇūsāṇaṃ | pāyālā va atārimā /
text.453: kīvā jattha ya kissanti | nāisaṃgehi mucchiyā
text.454: taṃ ca bhikkhū parinnāya | savve saṃgā mahāsavā /
text.458: rāyāṇo rāyamaccā ya | māhaṇā adu va khattiyā /
text.461: bhuñja bhoge ime sagghe | maharisī pūjayāmu taṃ
text.464: jo tume niyamo ciṇṇo | bhikkhubhāvammi suvvayā /
text.466: ciraṃ dūijjamāṇassa | doso dāṇiṃ kuo tava /
text.469: tattha mandā visīyanti | ujjāṇaṃsi va dubbalā
text.472: evaṃ nimantaṇaṃ laddhuṃ | mucchiyā giddha itthisu /
text.473: ajjhovavannā kāmehiṃ | noijjantā gayā gihaṃ  ti bemi ||
text.477: valayaṃ gahaṇaṃ nūmaṃ | ko jāṇai parājayaṃ
text.480: evaṃ u samaṇā ege | abalaṃ naccāṇa appagaṃ /
text.482: ko jāṇai viūvāyaṃ | itthīo udagāu vā /
text.483: coijjantā pavakkhāmo | na no atthi pakappiyaṃ
text.487: no te piṭham uvehinti | kiṃ paraṃ maraṇaṃ siyā
text.491: je evaṃ paribhāsanti | antae te samāhie
text.493: piṇḍavāyaṃ gilāṇassa | jaṃ sāreha dalāha ya
text.497: evaṃ tubbhe pabhāsantā | dupakkhaṃ ceva sevaha
text.498: tubbhe bhuñjaha pāesu | gilāṇo abhihaḍammi ya /
text.499: taṃ ca bīodagaṃ bhoccā | tam uddissādi jaṃ kaḍaṃ
text.503: na esa niyae magge | asamikkhā vaī kiī
text.504: erisā jā vaī esā | aggaveṇu vva karisiyā /
text.505: gihiṇo abhihaḍaṃ seyaṃ | bhuñjiuṃ na u bhikkhuṇaṃ
text.506: dhammapannavaṇā jā sā | sārambhā na visohiyā /
text.507: na u eyāhi diṭhīhiṃ | puvvam āsiṃ pagappiyaṃ
text.509: tao vāyaṃ nirākiccā | te bhujjo vi pagabbhiyā
text.511: āusse saraṇaṃ janti | aṃkaṇā iva pavvayaṃ
text.513: jeṇanne na virujjhejjā | teṇa taṃ taṃ samāyare
text.514: imaṃ ca dhammam āyāya | kāsaveṇa paveiyaṃ /
text.517: uvasagge niyāmittā | āmokkhāe parivvaejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.522: abhuñjiyā namī videhī | rāmagutte ya bhuñjiyā /
text.523: bāhue udagaṃ bhoccā | tahā nārāyaṇe risī
text.525: pārāsare dagaṃ bhoccā | bīyāṇi hariyāṇi ya
text.526: ee puvvaṃ mahāpurisā | āhiyā iha saṃmayā /
text.527: bhoccā bīyodagaṃ siddhā | ii meyam aṇussuyaṃ
text.528: tattha mandā visīyanti | vāhacchinnā va gaddabhā /
text.530: ihamege u bhāsanti | sāyaṃ sāeṇa vijjaī /
text.531: je tattha āriyaṃ maggaṃ | paramaṃ ca samāhiyaṃ
text.532: mā eyaṃ avamannantā | appeṇaṃ lumpahā bahuṃ /
text.533: eyassa u amokkhāe | ayohāri vva jūraha
text.536: evam ege u pāsatthā | pannavanti aṇāriyā /
text.538: jahā gaṇḍaṃ pilāgaṃ vā | paripīlejja muhuttagaṃ /
text.539: evaṃ vinnavaṇitthīsu | doso tattha kao siyā
text.540: jahā mandhādaṇe nāma | thimiyaṃ bhuñjaī dagaṃ /
text.541: evaṃ vinnavaṇitthīsu | doso tattha kao siyā
text.542: jahā vihaṃgamā piṅgā | thimiyaṃ bhuñjaī dagaṃ /
text.543: evaṃ vinnavaṇitthīsu | doso tattha kao siyā
text.544: evam ege u pāsatthā | micchadiṭhī aṇāriyā /
text.547: te pacchā paritappanti | khīṇe āummi jovvaṇe
text.548: jehiṃ kāle parikkantaṃ | na pacchā paritappae /
text.550: jahā naī veyaraṇī | duttarā iha saṃmayā /
text.552: jehiṃ nārīṇa saṃjogā | pūyaṇā piṭhao kayā /
text.553: savvam eyaṃ nirākiccā | te ṭhiyā susamāhie
text.556: taṃ ca bhikkhū parinnāya | suvvae samie care /
text.557: musāvāyaṃ ca vajjijjā | adinnādāṇaṃ ca vosire
text.558: uḍḍham ahe tiriyaṃ vā | je keī tasathāvarā /
text.559: savvattha viraiṃ kujjā | santi nivvāṇam āhiyaṃ
text.560: imaṃ ca dhammam āyāya | kāsaveṇa paveiyaṃ /
text.563: uvasagge niyāmittā | āmokkhāe parivvaejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.566: je māyaraṃ ca piyaraṃ ca | vippajahāya puvvasaṃjogaṃ /
text.568: suhumeṇaṃ taṃ parikkamma | channapaeṇa itthio mandā /
text.569: uvvāyaṃ pi tāu jāṇaṃsu | jahā lissanti bhikkhuṇo ege
text.570: pāse bhisaṃ nisīyanti | abhikkhaṇaṃ posavatthaṃ parihinti /
text.571: kāyaṃ ahe vi daṃsanti | bāhū uddhau kakkhamaṇuvvae
text.573: eyāṇi ceva se jāṇe | pāsāṇi virūvarūvāṇi
text.574: no tāsu cakkhu saṃdhejjā | no vi ya sāhasaṃ samabhijāṇe /
text.575: no sahiyaṃ pi viharejjā | evam appā surakkhio hoi
text.577: eyāṇi ceva se jāṇe | saddāṇi virūvarūvāṇi
text.580: sīhaṃ jahā va kuṇimeṇaṃ | nibbhayam egacaraṃ ti pāseṇaṃ /
text.582: aha tattha puṇo namayantī | rahakāro va nemi āṇupuvvīe /
text.583: baddho mie va pāseṇaṃ | phandante vi na muccae tāhe
text.584: aha se 'utappaī pacchā | bhoccā pāyasaṃ va visamissaṃ /
text.585: evaṃ vivegam āyāya | saṃvāso na vi kappae davie
text.586: tamhā u vajjae itthī | visalittaṃ va kaṇagaṃ naccā /
text.587: oe kulāṇi basavattī | āghāe na se vi nigganthe
text.588: je eyaṃ uñchaṃ aṇugiddhā | annayarā honti kusīlāṇaṃ /
text.589: sutavassie vi se bhikkhū | no vihare saha -am itthīsu
text.590: avi dhūyarāhi suṇhāhiṃ | dhāīhiṃ aduva dāsīhiṃ /
text.591: mahaīhi vā kumārīhiṃ | saṃthavaṃ se na kujjā aṇagāre
text.592: adu nāiṇaṃ ca suhīṇaṃ vā | appiyaṃ daṭhu egayā hoi /
text.594: samaṇaṃ pi daṭhudāsīṇaṃ | tattha vi tāva ege kuppanti /
text.595: adu vā bhoyaṇehi natthehiṃ | itthīdosaṃ saṃkiṇo honti
text.597: tamhā samaṇā na samenti | āyahiyāe saṃnisejjāo
text.598: bahave gihāiṃ avahau | missībhāvaṃ patthuyā ya ege /
text.600: suddhaṃ ravai parisāe | aha rahassammi dukkaḍaṃ karenti /
text.601: jāṇanti ya -aṃ tahāviū | māille mahāsaḍhe 'yaṃ ti
text.602: sayaṃ dukkaḍaṃ ca na vayai | āiṭho vi pakatthai bāle /
text.603: veyāṇuvīi mā kāsī | coijjanto gilāi se bhuñjo
text.609: ii ettha pāvasaṃtattā | na venti puṇo na kāhinti
text.610: suyam eyam evam egesiṃ | itthīveya tti hu suyakkhāyaṃ /
text.611: eyaṃ pi tā vaittāṇaṃ | adu vā kammuṇā avakarenti
text.612: annaṃ maṇeṇa cintenti | vāyā annaṃ ca kammuṇā annaṃ /
text.613: tamhā na saddahe bhikkhū | bahumāyāo itthio naccā
text.615: virayā carissahaṃ rukkhaṃ | dhammam āikkha -e bhayantāro
text.616: adu sāviyāpavāeṇaṃ | aham aṃsi sāhammiṇī ya samaṇāṇaṃ /
text.617: jaukumbhe jahā uvajjoī | saṃvāse viū visīejjā
text.620: kuvvanti pāvagaṃ kammaṃ | puṭhā vegevam āhiṃsu /
text.621: no haṃ karemi pāvaṃ ti | aṃkesāiṇī mamesa tti
text.622: bālassa mandayaṃ bīyaṃ | jaṃ ca kaḍaṃ avajāṇai bhujjo /
text.623: duguṇaṃ karei se pāvaṃ | pūyaṇakāmo visannesī
text.625: vatthaṃ ca tāi pāyaṃ vā | annaṃ pāṇagaṃ paḍiggāhe
text.626: nīvāram evaṃ bujjhejjā | no icche agāram āgantuṃ /
text.627: baddhe visayapāsehiṃ | moham āvajjai puṇo mande  tti bemi ||
text.630: oe sayā na rajjejjā | bhogakāmī puṇo virajjejjā /
text.631: bhoge samaṇāṇa suṇeha | jaha bhuñjanti bhikkhuṇo ege
text.632: aha taṃ tu bheyam āvannaṃ | mucchiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ kāmamaivaaṃ /
text.633: palibhindiyā -aṃ to pacchā | pāduddhau muddhi pahaṇanti
text.634: jai kesiyā -aṃ mae bhikkhu | no vihare saha -am itthīe /
text.635: kesāṇavi haṃ luñcissaṃ | nannattha mae carejjāsi
text.636: aha -aṃ se hoi uvaladdho | to pesanti tahābhūehiṃ /
text.638: dārūṇi sāgapāgāe | pajjoo vā bhavissaī rāo /
text.639: pāyāṇi ya me rayāvehi | ehi tā me piṭhaomadde
text.640: vatthāṇi ya me paḍilehehi | annaṃ pāṇaṃ ca āharāhi tti /
text.641: gandhaṃ ca raoharaṇaṃ ca | kāsavagaṃ ca me samaṇujāṇāhi
text.642: adu añjaṇiṃ alaṃkāraṃ | kukkayayaṃ me payacchāhi /
text.643: loddhaṃ ca loddhakusumaṃ ca | veṇupalāsiyaṃ ca guliyaṃ ca
text.644: kuṭhaṃ tagaraṃ ca agaruṃ | saṃpiṭhaṃ sammaṃ usireṇaṃ /
text.647: satthaṃ ca sūvacchejjāe | āṇīlaṃ ca vatthayaṃ rayāvehi
text.648: suphaṇiṃ ca sāgapāgāe | āmalagāiṃ dagāharaṇaṃ ca /
text.649: tilagakaraṇim añjaṇasalāgaṃ | ghiṃsu me vihūṇayaṃ vijāṇehi
text.650: saṃḍāsagaṃ ca phaṇihaṃ ca | sīhalipāsagaṃ ca āṇāhi /
text.652: pūgaphalaṃ taṃbollayaṃ | sūi suttagaṃ ca jāṇāhi /
text.653: kosaṃ ca moyamehāe | suppukkhalagaṃ ca khāragālaṇaṃ ca
text.654: candālagaṃ ca karagaṃ ca | vaccagharaṃ ca āuso khaṇāhi /
text.655: sarapāyayaṃ ca jāyāe | gorahagaṃ ca sāmaṇerāe
text.656: ghaḍigaṃ ca saḍiṇḍimayaṃ ca | celagolaṃ kumārabhūyāe /
text.657: vāsaṃ samabhiāvaṇṇaṃ | āvasahaṃ ca jāṇa bhattaṃ ca
text.659: adu puttadohalaṭhāe | āṇappā havanti dāsā vā
text.660: jāe phale samuppanne | geṇhasu vā -aṃ ahavā jahāhi /
text.661: aha puttaposiṇo ege | bhāravahā havanti uā vā
text.662: rāo vi uṭhiyā santā | dāragaṃ ca saṃṭhavanti dhāī vā /
text.663: suhirāmaṇā vi te santā | vatthadhovā havanti haṃsā vā
text.665: dāse mie va pese vā | pasubhūe va se na vā keī
text.666: evaṃ khu tāsu vinnappaṃ | saṃthavaṃ saṃvāsaṃ ca vajjejjā /
text.667: tajjātiyā ime kāmā | vajjakarā ya evam akkhāe
text.668: eyaṃ bhayaṃ na seyāe | ii se appagaṃ nirumbhittā /
text.669: no itthiṃ no pasuṃ bhikkhu | no sayaṃ pāṇiṇā nilijjejjā
text.670: suvisuddhalese mehāvī | parakiriyaṃ ca vajjae nāṇī /
text.672: icc evam āhu se vīre | dhuyarae dhuyamohe se bhikkhu /
text.673: tamhā ajjhattavisuddhe suvimukke | āmokkhāe parivvaejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.676: pucchissahaṃ kevaliyaṃ mahesiṃ | kahaṃ bhitāvā naragā puratthā /
text.677: ajāṇao me muṇi būhi jāṇaṃ | kahiṃ nu bālā naragaṃ uventi
text.678: evaṃ mae puṭha mahāṇubhāve | iṇamo 'bbavī kāsave āsupanne /
text.679: paveyaissaṃ duham aṭhaduggaṃ | āīṇiyaṃ dukkaḍiṇaṃ puratthā
text.680: je kei bālā iha jīviyaṭhī | pāvāiṃ kammāiṃ karenti ruddā /
text.681: te ghorarūve tamisandhayāre | tivvābhitāve narage paḍanti
text.682: tivvaṃ tase pāṇiṇo thāvare ya | je hiṃsaī āyasuhaṃ paḍuccā /
text.683: je lūsae hoi adattahārī | na sikkhaī seyaviyassa kiṃci
text.684: pāgabbhi pāṇe bahuṇaṃ tivāī | anivvue ghāyam uvei bāle /
text.685: niho nisaṃ gacchai antakāle | ahosiraṃ kau uvei duggaṃ
text.686: haṇa chindaha bhindaha -aṃ daheti | sadde suṇentā paradhammiyāṇaṃ /
text.687: te nāragāo bhayabhinnasannā | kaṃkhanti kaṃ nāma disaṃ vayāmo
text.688: iṅgālarāsiṃ jaliyaṃ sajoiṃ | tattovamaṃ bhūmim aṇukkamantā /
text.689: te ḍajjhamāṇā kaluṇaṃ thaṇanti | arahassarā tattha ciraṭhiīyā
text.690: jai te suyā veyaraṇī bhiduggā | nisio jahā khura iva tikkhasoyā /
text.691: taranti te veyaraṇiṃ bhiduggaṃ | usucoiyā sattisu hammamāṇā
text.692: kīlehi vijjhanti asāhukammā | nāvaṃ uvente saivippahūṇā /
text.693: anne u sūlāhi tisūliyāhiṃ | dīhāhi viddhūṇa ahe karenti
text.694: kesiṃ ca bandhittu gale silāo | udagaṃsi bolenti mahālayaṃsi /
text.695: kalaṃbuyāvāluyamummure ya | lolanti paccanti ya tattha anne
text.696: āsūriyaṃ nāma mahābhitāvaṃ | andhaṃ tamaṃ duppataraṃ mahantaṃ /
text.697: uḍḍhaṃ ahe yaṃ tiriyaṃ disāsu | samāhio jatthagaṇī jhiyāi
text.698: jaṃsī guhāe jalaṇe 'tiue | avijāṇao ḍajjhai luttapanno /
text.699: sayā ya kaluṇaṃ puṇa ghammaṭhāṇaṃ | gāḍhovaṇīyaṃ aidukkhadhammaṃ
text.700: cattāri agaṇīo samārabhettā | jahiṃ kūrakammā bhitaventi bālaṃ /
text.701: te tattha ciṭhantabhitappamāṇā | macchā va jīvanto va joipattā
text.702: saṃtacchaṇaṃ nāma mahābhitāvaṃ | te nāragā jattha asāhukammā /
text.703: hatthehi pāehi ya bandhiūṇaṃ | phalagaṃ va tacchanti kuhāḍahatthā
text.705: payanti -aṃ neraie phurante | sajīvamacche va ayokavalle
text.706: no ceva te tattha masībhavanti | na majjaī tivvabhiveyaṇāe /
text.707: tamāṇubhāgaṃ aṇuveyayantā | dukkhanti dukkhī iha dukkaḍeṇaṃ
text.708: tahiṃ ca te lolaṇasaṃpagāḍhe | gāḍhaṃ sutattaṃ agaṇiṃ vayanti /
text.709: na tattha sāyaṃ lahaī bhidugge | arahiyābhitāvā taha vī taventi
text.710: se succaī nagaravahe vva sadde | duhovaṇīyāṇi payāṇi tattha /
text.711: udiṇṇakammāṇa udiṇṇakammā | puṇo puṇo te sarahaṃ duhenti
text.712: pāṇehi -aṃ pāva viyojayanti | taṃ bhe pavakkhāmi jahātaheṇaṃ /
text.713: daṇḍehi tatthā sarayanti bālā | savvehi daṇḍehi purākaehiṃ
text.714: te hammamāṇā narage paḍanti | puṇṇe durūvassa mahābhitāve /
text.715: te tattha ciṭhanti durūvabhakkhī | tuanti kammovagayā kimīhiṃ
text.716: sayā kasiṇaṃ puṇo ghammaṭhāṇaṃ | gāḍhovaṇīyaṃ aidukkhadhammaṃ /
text.717: andūsu pakkhippa vihattu dehaṃ | veheṇa sīsaṃ se 'bhitāvayanti
text.718: chindanti bālassa khureṇa nakkaṃ | oṭhe vi chindanti duve vi kaṇṇe /
text.719: jibbhaṃ viṇikkassa vihatthimettaṃ | tikkhāhi sūlāhi bhitāvayanti
text.720: te tippamāṇā talasaṃpuḍaṃ va | rāiṃdiyaṃ tattha thaṇanti bālā /
text.722: jai te suyā lohiyapūyapāī | bālāgaṇī teaguṇā pareṇaṃ /
text.724: pakkhippa tāsuṃ payayanti bāle | aassare te kaluṇaṃ rasante /
text.726: appeṇa appaṃ iha vañcaittā | bhavāhame puvvasae sahasse /
text.727: ciṭhanti tatthā bahukūrakammā | jahā kaḍaṃ kamma tahāsi bhāre
text.728: samajjiṇittā kalusaṃ aṇajjā | iṭhehi kantehi ya vippahūṇā /
text.729: te dubbhigandhe kasiṇe ya phāse | kammovagā kuṇime āvasanti  tti bemi ||
text.732: ahāvaraṃ sāsayadukkhadhammaṃ | taṃ bhe pavakkhāmi jahātaheṇaṃ /
text.733: bālā jahā dukkaḍakammakārī | veyanti kammāiṃ purekaḍāiṃ
text.734: hatthehi pāehi ya bandhiūṇaṃ | uyaraṃ vikattanti khurāsiehiṃ /
text.735: giṇhittu bālassa vihattu dehaṃ | vaddhaṃ thiraṃ piṭhau uddharanti
text.736: bāhū pakattanti ya mūlao se | thūlaṃ viyāsaṃ muhe āḍahanti /
text.737: rahaṃsi juttaṃ sarayanti bālaṃ | ārussa vijjhanti tudeṇa piṭhe
text.738: ayaṃ va tattaṃ jaliyaṃ sajoi | taūvamaṃ bhūmim aṇukkamantā /
text.739: te ḍajjhamāṇā kaluṇaṃ thaṇanti | usucoiyā tattajugesu juttā
text.740: bālā balā bhūmim aṇukkamantā | pavijjalaṃ lohapahaṃ ca tattaṃ /
text.741: jaṃsī bhiduggaṃsi pavajjamāṇā | pese va daṇḍehi purā karenti
text.742: te saṃpagāḍhaṃsi pavajjamāṇā | silāhi hammanti nipātiṇīhiṃ /
text.743: saṃtāvaṇī nāma ciraṭhiīyā | saṃtappaī jattha asāhukammā
text.744: kandūsu pakkhippa payanti bālaṃ | tao vi daḍḍhā puṇa uppayanti /
text.745: te uḍḍhakāehi pakhajjamāṇā | avarehi khajjanti saṇapphaehiṃ
text.746: samūsiyaṃ nāma vidhūmaṭhāṇaṃ | jaṃ soyatattā kaluṇaṃ thaṇanti /
text.747: ahosiraṃ kau vigattiūṇaṃ | ayaṃ va satthehi samosaventi
text.748: samūsiyā tattha visūṇiyaṃgā | pakkhīhi khajjanti ayomuhehiṃ /
text.749: saṃjīvaṇī nāma ciraṭhiīyā | jaṃsī payā hammai pāvaceyā
text.750: tikkhāhi sūlāhi nivāyayanti | vasogayaṃ sāvayayaṃ va laddhaṃ /
text.751: te sūlaviddhā kaluṇaṃ thaṇanti | egantadukkhaṃ duhao gilāṇā
text.752: sayā jalaṃ nāma nihaṃ mahantaṃ | jaṃsī jalanto agaṇī akaṭho /
text.753: ciṭhanti baddhā bahukūrakammā | arahassarā kei ciraṭhiīyā
text.754: ciyā mahantīu samārabhittā | chubbhanti te ta kaluṇaṃ rasantaṃ /
text.755: āvaaī tattha asāhukammā | sappī jahā paḍiyaṃ joimajjhe
text.756: sayā kasiṇaṃ puṇa ghammaṭhāṇaṃ | gāḍhovaṇīyaṃ aidukkhadhammaṃ /
text.757: hatthehi pāehi ya bandhiūṇaṃ | sattu vva daṇḍehi samārabhanti
text.758: bhañjanti bālassa vaheṇa puṭhī | sīsaṃ pi bhindanti ayoghaṇehiṃ /
text.759: te bhinnadehā phalagaṃ va tacchā | tattāhi ārāhi niyojayanti
text.760: abhijuṃjiyā rudda asāhukammā | usucoiyā hatthivahaṃ vahanti /
text.761: egaṃ durūhittu duve tao vā | ārussa vijjhanti kakāṇao se
text.762: bālā balā bhūmim aṇukkamantā | pavijjalaṃ kaṇailaṃ mahantaṃ /
text.764: veyālie nāma mahābhitāve | egāyae pavvayam antalikkhe /
text.765: hammanti tatthā bahukūrakammā | paraṃ sahassāṇa muhuttagāṇaṃ
text.766: saṃbāhiyā dukkaḍiṇo thaṇanti | aho ya rāo paritappamāṇā /
text.767: egantakūḍe narage mahante | kūḍeṇa tatthā visame hayā u
text.768: bhañjanti -aṃ puvvamarī sarosaṃ | samuggare te musale gaheuṃ /
text.769: te bhinnadehā ruhiraṃ vamantā | omuddhagā dharaṇitale paḍanti
text.770: aṇāsiyā nāma mahāsiyālā | pāgabbhiṇo tattha sayāvakovā /
text.771: khajjanti tatthā bahukūrakammā | adūragā saṃkhaliyāhi baddhā
text.772: sayājalā nāma naī bhiduggā | pavijjalaṃ lohavilīṇatattā /
text.774: eyāiṃ phāsāiṃ phusanti bālaṃ | nirantaraṃ tattha ciraṭhiīyaṃ /
text.775: na hammamāṇassa u hoi tāṇaṃ | ego sayaṃ paccaṇuhoi dukkhaṃ
text.776: jaṃ jārisaṃ puvvamakāsi kammaṃ | tam eva āgacchai saṃparāe /
text.777: egantadukkhaṃ bhavamajjaṇittā | veyanti dukkhī tam aṇantadukkhaṃ
text.778: eyāṇi soccā naragāṇi dhīre | na hiṃsae kiṃcaṇa savvaloe /
text.779: egantadiṭhī apariggahe u | bujjhijja logassa vasaṃ na gacche
text.781: sa savvam eyaṃ ii veyaittā | kaṃkhejja kālaṃ dhuyam āyarejja  tti bemi ||
text.784: pucchissu -aṃ samaṇā māhaṇā ya | agāriṇo yā paratitthiyā ya /
text.785: se kei negantahiyaṃ dhammam āhu | aṇelisaṃ sāhusamikkhayāe
text.786: kahaṃ ca nāṇaṃ kaha daṃsaṇaṃ se | sīlaṃ kahaṃ nāyasuyassa āsi /
text.787: jāṇāsi -aṃ bhikkhu jahātaheṇaṃ | ahāsuyaṃ būhi jahā nisantaṃ
text.788: kheyannae se kusalāsupanne | aṇantanāṇī ya aṇantadaṃsī /
text.789: jasaṃsiṇo cakkhupahe ṭhiyassa | jāṇāhi dhammaṃ ca dhiiṃ ca pehi
text.790: uḍḍhaṃ ahe yaṃ tiriyaṃ disāsu | tasā ya je thāvara je ya pāṇā /
text.791: se niccaniccehi samikkha panne | dīve va dhammaṃ samiyaṃ udāhu
text.792: se savvadaṃsī abhibhūyanāṇī | nirāmagandhe dhiimaṃ ṭhiyappā /
text.793: aṇuttare savvajagaṃsi vijjaṃ | ganthā aīe abhae aṇāū
text.794: se bhūipanne aṇieacārī | ohaṃtare dhīre aṇantacakkhū /
text.795: aṇuttaraṃ tappai sūrie vā | vairoyaṇinde va tamaṃ pagāse
text.796: aṇuttaraṃ dhammam iṇaṃ jiṇāṇaṃ | neyā muṇī kāsava āsupanne /
text.797: inde va devāṇa mahāṇubhāve | sahassaṇeyā divi -aṃ visiṭhe
text.798: se pannayā akkhayasāgare vā | madodahī vā vi aṇantapāre /
text.799: aṇāvile vā akasāi mukke | sakke va devāhivaī juīmaṃ
text.800: se vīrieṇaṃ paḍipuṇṇavīrie | sudaṃsaṇe vā nagasavvaseṭhe /
text.801: surālae vā si mudāgare se | virāyae negaguṇovavee
text.802: sayaṃ sahassāṇa u joyaṇāṇaṃ | tikaṇḍage paṇḍagavejayante /
text.803: se joyaṇe navanavate sahasse | uddhussiyo heṭha sahassam egaṃ
text.804: puṭhe nabhe ciṭhai bhūmivaṭhie | jaṃ sūriyā aṇuparivaayanti /
text.805: se hemavaṇṇe bahunandaṇe ya | jaṃsī raiṃ veyayaī mahindā
text.807: aṇuttare girisu ya pavvadugge | girīvare se jalie va bhome
text.808: mahīi majjhammi ṭhie naginde | pannāyae sūriyasuddhalese /
text.809: evaṃ sirīe u sa bhūrivaṇṇe | maṇorame joyai accimālī
text.810: sudaṃsaṇasseva jaso girissa | pavuccaī mahao pavvayassa /
text.812: girīvare vā nisahāyayāṇaṃ | ruyae va seṭhe valayāyayāṇaṃ /
text.813: taovame se jagabhūipanne | muṇīṇa majjhe tam udāhu panne
text.814: aṇuttaraṃ dhammam udīraittā | aṇuttaraṃ jhāṇavaraṃ jhiyāi /
text.816: aṇuttaraggaṃ paramaṃ mahesī | asesakammaṃ sa visohaittā /
text.817: siddhiṃ gae sāimaṇantapatte | nāṇeṇa sīleṇa ya daṃsaṇeṇa
text.818: rukkhesu nāe jaha sāmalī vā | jassiṃ raiṃ veyayaī suvaṇṇā /
text.819: vaṇesu vā nandaṇam āhu seṭhaṃ | nāṇeṇa sīleṇa ya bhūipanne
text.820: thaṇiyaṃ va saddāṇa aṇuttare u | cando va tārāṇa mahāṇubhāve /
text.821: gandhesu vā candaṇam āhu seṭhaṃ | evaṃ muṇīṇaṃ apaḍinnam āhu
text.822: jahā sayaṃbhū udahīṇa seṭhe | nāgesu vā dharaṇindam āhu seṭhaṃ /
text.823: khoodae vā rasa vejayante | tavovahāṇe muṇi vejayante
text.824: hatthīsu erāvaṇam āhu nāe | sīho migāṇaṃ salilāṇa gaṅgā /
text.825: pakkhīsu vā garule veṇudevo | nivvāṇavādīṇiha nāyaputte
text.826: johesu nāe jaha vīsaseṇe | pupphesu vā jaha aravindam āhu /
text.827: khattīṇa seṭhe jaha dantavakke | isīṇa seṭhe taha vaddhamāṇe
text.828: dāṇāṇa seṭhaṃ abhayappayāṇaṃ | saccesu vā aṇavajjaṃ vayanti /
text.829: tavesu vā uttamaṃ bambhaceraṃ | loguttame samaṇe nāyaputte
text.830: ṭhiīṇa seṭhā lavasattamā vā | sabhā suhammā va sabhāṇa seṭhā /
text.831: nivvāṇaseṭhā jaha savvadhammā | na nāyaputtā paramatthi nāṇī
text.832: puḍhovame dhuṇai vigayagehī | na saṃnihiṃ kuvvai āsupanne /
text.833: tariuṃ samuddaṃ va mahābhavoghaṃ | abhayaṃkare vīra aṇantacakkhū
text.834: kohaṃ ca māṇaṃ ca taheva māyaṃ | lobhaṃ cautthaṃ ajjhattadosā /
text.835: eyāṇi vantā arahā mahesī | na kuvvaī pāva na kāravei
text.837: se savvavāyaṃ ii veyaittā | uvaṭhie saṃjamadīharāyaṃ
text.838: se vāriyā itthi sarāibhattaṃ | uvahāṇavaṃ dukkhakhayaṭhayāe /
text.839: logaṃ vidittā āraṃ paraṃ ca | savvaṃ pabhū vāriya savvavāraṃ
text.840: soccā ya dhammaṃ arahantabhāsiyaṃ | samāhiyaṃ aṭhapadovasuddhaṃ /
text.841: taṃ saddahāṇā ya jaṇā aṇāū | indā va devāhiva āgamissanti  tti bemi ||
text.844: puḍhavī ya āū agaṇī ya vāū | taṇa rukkha bīyā ya tasā ya pāṇā /
text.845: je aṇḍayā je ya jarāu pāṇā | saṃseyayā je rasayābhihāṇā
text.846: eyāiṃ kāyāiṃ paveiyāiṃ | eesu jāṇe paḍileha sāyaṃ /
text.847: eeṇa kāeṇa ya āyadaṇḍe | eesu yā vippariyāsuventi
text.849: se jāi jāiṃ bahukūrakamme | jaṃ kuvvaī bhijjai teṇa bāle
text.850: assiṃ ca loe adu vā paratthā | sayaggaso vā taha annahā vā /
text.851: saṃsāram āvanna paraṃ paraṃ te | bandhanti veyanti ya dunniyāṇi
text.852: je māyaraṃ vā piyaraṃ ca hiccā | samaṇavvae agaṇiṃ samārabhijjā /
text.853: ahāhu se loe kusīladhamme | bhūyāiṃ je hiṃsai āyasāe
text.854: ujjālao pāṇa nivāyaejjā | nivvāvao agaṇiṃ nivāyavejjā /
text.855: tamhā u mehāvi samikkha dhammaṃ | na paṇḍie agaṇiṃ samārabhijjā
text.856: puḍhavī vi jīvā āū vi jīvā | pāṇā ya saṃpāima saṃpayanti /
text.857: saṃseyayā kaṭhasamassiyā ya | ee dahe agaṇiṃ samārabhante
text.858: hariyāṇi bhūyāṇi vilambagāṇi | āhāra dehā ya puḍho siyāi /
text.859: je chindaī āyasuhaṃ paḍucca | pāgabbhi pāṇe bahuṇaṃ tivāī
text.860: jāiṃ ca vuḍḍhiṃ ca viṇāsayante | bīyāi assaṃjaya āyadaṇḍe /
text.861: ahāhu se loe aṇajjadhamme | bīyāi se hiṃsai āyasāe
text.862: gabbhāi mijjanti buyābuyāṇā | narā pare pañcasihā kumārā /
text.863: juvāṇagā majjhima theragā ya | cayanti te āukhae palīṇā
text.864: saṃbujjhahā jantavo māṇusattaṃ | daṭhuṃ bhayaṃ bāliseṇaṃ alambho /
text.865: egantadukkhe jarie va loe | sakammuṇā vippariyāsuvei
text.867: ege ya sīodagasevaṇeṇaṃ | hueṇa ege pavayanti mokkhaṃ
text.868: pāosiṇāṇāisu natthi mokkho | khārassa loṇassa aṇāsaṇeṇaṃ /
text.869: te majjamaṃsaṃ lasuṇaṃ ca bhoccā | annattha vāsaṃ parikappayanti
text.870: udageṇa je siddhim udāharanti | sāyaṃ ca pāyaṃ udagaṃ phusantā /
text.871: udagassa phāseṇa siyā ya siddhī | sijjhiṃsu pāṇā bahave dagaṃsi
text.872: macchā ya kummā ya sirīsivā ya | maggū ya uā dagarakkhasā ya /
text.873: aṭhāṇam eyaṃ kusalā vayanti | udageṇa je siddhim udāharanti
text.874: udagaṃ jaī kammamalaṃ harejjā | evaṃ suhaṃ icchāmittam eva /
text.875: andhaṃ va neyāram aṇussarittā | pāṇāṇi cevaṃ viṇihanti mandā
text.876: pāvāiṃ kammāiṃ pakuvvao hi | siodagaṃ ū jai taṃ harejjā /
text.877: sijjhiṃsu ege dagasattaghāī | musaṃ vayante jalasiddhim āhu
text.878: hueṇa je siddhim udāharanti | sāyaṃ ca pāyaṃ agaṇiṃ phusantā /
text.879: evaṃ siyā siddhi havejja tamhā | agaṇiṃ phusantāṇa kukammiṇaṃ pi
text.880: aparikkha diṭhaṃ na hu eva siddhī | ehinti te ghāyam abujjhamāṇā /
text.881: bhūehi jāṇaṃ paḍileha sāyaṃ | vijjaṃ gahāyaṃ tasathāvarehiṃ
text.882: thaṇanti luppanti tasanti kammī | puḍho jagā parisaṃkhāya bhikkhū /
text.883: tamhā viū virao āyagutte | daṭhuṃ tase yā paḍisaṃharejjā
text.884: je dhammaladdhaṃ viṇihāya bhuñje | viyaḍeṇa sāhau ya je siṇāiṃ /
text.885: je dhovaī lūsayaī va vatthaṃ | ahāhu te nāgaṇiyassa dūre
text.886: kammaṃ parinnāya dagaṃsi dhīre | viyaḍeṇa jīvejja ya ādimokkhaṃ /
text.887: se bīyakandāi abhuñjamāṇe | virae siṇāṇāisu itthiyāsu
text.888: je māyaraṃ ca piyaraṃ ca hiccā | gāraṃ tahā puttapasuṃ dhaṇaṃ ca /
text.889: kulāiṃ je dhāvai sāugāiṃ | ahāhu se sāmaṇiyassa dūre
text.890: kulāiṃ je dhāvai sāugāiṃ | āghāi dhammaṃ uyarāṇugiddhe /
text.891: ahāhu se āyariyāṇa sayaṃse | je lāvaejjā asaṇassa heū
text.893: nīvāragiddhe va mahāvarāhe | adūrae ehii ghāyam eva
text.895: pāsatthayaṃ ceva kusīlayaṃ ca | nissārae hoi jahā pulāe
text.896: annāyapiṇḍeṇa hiyāsaejjā | no pūyaṇaṃ tavasā āvahejjā /
text.897: saddehi rūvehi asajjamāṇaṃ | savvehi kāmehi viṇīya gehiṃ
text.898: savvāiṃ saṃgāiṃ aicca dhīre | savvāiṃ dukkhāiṃ titikkhamāṇe /
text.899: akhile agiddhe aṇieyacārī | abhayaṃkare bhikkhu aṇāvilappā
text.900: bhārassa jāā muṇi bhuñjaejjā | kaṃkhejja pāvassa vivega bhikkhū /
text.901: dukkheṇa puṭhe dhuyamāiejjā | saṃgāmasīse va paraṃ damejjā
text.902: avi hammamāṇe phalagāvataṭhī | samāgamaṃ kaṃkhai antagassa /
text.903: nidhūya kammaṃ na pavañcuvei | akkhakkhae vā sagaḍaṃ ti bemi
text.906: duhā veyaṃ suyakkhāyaṃ | vīriyaṃ ti pavuccaī /
text.907: kiṃ nu vīrassa vīrattaṃ | kahaṃ ceyaṃ pavuccaī
text.908: kammam ege pavedenti | akammaṃ vā vi suvvayā /
text.909: eehiṃ dohi ṭhāṇehiṃ | jehiṃ dīsanti macciyā
text.911: tabbhāvādesao vā vi | bālaṃ paṇḍiyam eva vā
text.912: sattham ege tu sikkhantā | aivāyāya pāṇiṇaṃ /
text.914: māyiṇo kau māyā ya | kāmabhoge samārabhe /
text.916: maṇasā vayasā ceva | kāyasā ceva antaso /
text.917: ārao parao vā vi | duhā vi ya asaṃjayā
text.918: verāiṃ kuvvaī verī | tao verehi rajjaī /
text.919: pāvovagā ya ārambhā | dukkhaphāsā ya antaso
text.921: rāgadosassiyā bālā | pāvaṃ kuvvanti te bahuṃ
text.925: paṇolla pāvagaṃ kammaṃ | sallaṃ kantai antaso
text.927: bhujjo bhujjo duhāvāsaṃ | asuhattaṃ tahā tahā
text.929: aṇiyae ayaṃ vāse | nāyaehi suhīhi ya
text.930: evam āyāya mehāvī | appaṇo giddhim uddhare /
text.935: tasseva antarā khippaṃ | sikkhaṃ sikkhejja paṇḍie
text.936: jahā kumme saaṅgāiṃ | sae dehe samāhare /
text.938: sāhare hatthapāe ya | maṇaṃ pañcindiyāṇi ya /
text.939: pāvagaṃ ca parīṇāmaṃ | bhāsādosaṃ ca tārisaṃ
text.940: aṇu māṇaṃ ca māyaṃ ca | taṃ parinnāya paṇḍie /
text.942: pāṇe ya nāivāejjā | adinnaṃ pi ya nāyae /
text.943: sāiyaṃ na musaṃ būyā | esa dhamme vusīmao
text.944: aikkammanti vāyāe | maṇasā vi na patthae /
text.946: kaḍaṃ ca kajjamāṇaṃ ca | āgamissaṃ ca pāvagaṃ /
text.949: asuddhaṃ tesiṃ parakkantaṃ | saphalaṃ hoi savvaso
text.950: je ya buddhā mahābhāgā | vīrā sammattadaṃsiṇo /
text.951: suddhaṃ tesiṃ parakkantaṃ | aphalaṃ hoi savvaso
text.952: tesiṃ pi na tavo suddho | nikkhantā je mahākulā /
text.953: jaṃ nevanne viyāṇanti | na silogaṃ pavejjae
text.955: khante bhinivvuḍe dante | vīyagiddhī sayā jae
text.957: titikkhaṃ paramaṃ naccā | āmokkhāe parivvaejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.961: añju dhammaṃ jahātaccaṃ | jiṇāṇaṃ taṃ suṇeha me
text.962: māhaṇā khattiyā vessā | caṇḍālā adu bokkasā /
text.963: esiyā vesiyā suddā | je ya ārambhanissiyā
text.967: anne haranti taṃ vittaṃ | kammī kammehi kiccaī
text.968: māyā piyā ṇhusā bhāyā | bhajjā puttā ya orasā /
text.969: nālaṃ te tava tāṇāya | luppantassa sakammuṇā
text.972: ciccā vittaṃ ca putte ya | nāio ya pariggahaṃ /
text.976: eehiṃ chahiṃ kāehiṃ | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā /
text.978: musāvāyaṃ bahiddhaṃ ca | uggahaṃ ca ajāiyā /
text.980: paliuñcaṇaṃ ca bhayaṇaṃ ca | thaṇḍillussayaṇāṇi ya /
text.987: pūyaṃ aṇesaṇijjaṃ ca | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.989: uccholaṇaṃ ca kakkaṃ ca | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.991: sāgāriyaṃ ca piṇḍaṃ ca | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.992: aṭhāvayaṃ na sikkhijjā | vehāīyaṃ ca no vae /
text.993: hatthakammaṃ vivāyaṃ ca | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.994: pāṇahāo ya chattaṃ ca | nālīyaṃ vālavīyaṇaṃ /
text.995: parakiriyaṃ annamannaṃ ca | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.996: uccāraṃ pāsavaṇaṃ | hariesu na kare muṇī /
text.997: viyaḍeṇa vā vi sāhau | nāvamajje kayāi vi
text.998: paramatte annapāṇaṃ | na bhuñjejja kayāi vi /
text.999: paravatthaṃ acelo vi | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.1000: āsandī paliyaṅke ya | nisijjaṃ ca gihantare /
text.1001: saṃpucchaṇaṃ saraṇaṃ vā | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.1002: jasaṃ kittiṃ silogaṃ ca | jā ya vandaṇapūyaṇā /
text.1003: savvaloyaṃsi je kāmā | taṃ vijjaṃ parijāṇiyā
text.1008: bhāsamāṇo na bhāsejjā | neva vamphejja mammayaṃ /
text.1011: jaṃ channaṃ taṃ na vattavvaṃ | esā āṇā niyaṇṭhiyā
text.1012: holāvāyaṃ sahīvāyaṃ | goyāvāyaṃ ca no vae /
text.1013: tumaṃ tumaṃ ti amaṇunnaṃ | savvaso taṃ na vattae
text.1014: akusīle sayā bhikkhū | neva saṃsaggiyaṃ bhae /
text.1020: hammamāṇo na kuppejja | vuccamāṇo na saṃjale /
text.1021: sumaṇe ahiyāsejjā | na ya kolāhalaṃ kare
text.1022: laddhe kāme na patthejjā | vivege evam āhie /
text.1029: savvaṃ taṃ samayātīyaṃ | jam eyaṃ laviyaṃ bahu
text.1030: aimāṇaṃ ca māyaṃ ca | taṃ parinnāya paṇḍie /
text.1031: gāravāṇi ya savvāṇi | nivvāṇaṃ saṃdhae muṇi  tti bemi ||
text.1034: āghaṃ maīmaṃ aṇuvīi dhammaṃ | añjū samāhiṃ tam imaṃ suṇeha /
text.1035: apaḍinna bhikkhū u samāhipatte | aṇiyāṇa bhūesu parivvaejjā
text.1036: uḍḍhaṃ ahe yaṃ tiriyaṃ disāsu | tasā ya je thāvara je ya pāṇā /
text.1037: hatthehi pāehi ya saṃjamittā | adinnam annesu ya no gahejjā ũ
text.1038: suyakkhāyadhamme vitigicchatiṇṇe | lāḍhe care āyatule payāsu /
text.1039: āyaṃ na kujjā iha jīviyaṭhī | cayaṃ na kujjā sutavassi bhikkhū
text.1040: savvindiyābhinivvuḍe payāsu | care muṇī savvau vippamukke /
text.1041: pāsāhi pāṇe ya puḍho vi satte | dukkhena ae paritappamāṇe
text.1042: eesu bāle ya pakuvvamāṇe | āvaaī kammasu pāvaesu /
text.1043: aivāyao kīrai pāvakammaṃ | niuñjamāṇe u karei kammaṃ
text.1044: ādīṇavittī va karei pāvaṃ | mantā u egantasamāhim āhu /
text.1045: buddhe samāhīya rae vivege | pāṇāivāyā virae ṭhiyappā
text.1046: savvaṃ jagaṃ tū samayāṇupehī | piyam appiyaṃ kassa vi no karejjā /
text.1047: uṭhāya dīṇo ya puṇo visaṇṇo | saṃpūyaṇaṃ ceva siloyakāmī
text.1048: āhākaḍaṃ ceva nikāmamīṇe | niyāmacārī na visaṇṇamesī /
text.1049: itthīsu satte ya puḍho ya bāle | pariggahaṃ ceva pakuvvamāṇe
text.1050: verāṇugiddhe nicayaṃ karei | io cue se ihamaṭhaduggaṃ /
text.1051: tamhā u mehāvi samikkha dhammaṃ | care muṇī savvau vippamukke
text.1052: āyaṃ na kujjā iha jīviyaṭhī | asajjamāṇo ya parivvaejjā /
text.1053: nisammabhāsī ya viṇīya giddhiṃ | hiṃsanniyaṃ vā na kahaṃ karejjā
text.1054: āhākaḍaṃ vā na nikāmaejjā | nikāmayante ya na saṃthavejjā /
text.1055: dhuṇe urālaṃ aṇuvehamāṇe | ciccā na soyaṃ aṇavekkhamāṇo
text.1056: egattam eyaṃ abhipatthaejjā | evaṃ pamokkho na musaṃ ti pāsaṃ /
text.1057: esa ppamokkho amuse vare vi | akohaṇe saccarae tavassī
text.1058: itthīsu yā āraya mehuṇāo | pariggahaṃ ceva akuvvamāṇe /
text.1059: uccāvaesuṃ visaesu tāī | nissaṃsayaṃ bhikkhu samāhipatte
text.1060: araiṃ raiṃ ca abhibhūya bhikkhū | taṇāiphāsaṃ taha sīyaphāsaṃ /
text.1061: uṇhaṃ ca daṃsaṃ cahiyāsaejjā | subbhiṃ va dubbhiṃ va titikkhaejjā
text.1062: gutto vaīe ya samāhipatto | lesaṃ samāhau parivvaejjā /
text.1063: gihaṃ na chāe na vi chāyaejjā | saṃmissabhāvaṃ payahe payāsu
text.1064: je kei logammi u akiriyaāyā | anneṇa puṭhā dhuyam ādisanti /
text.1065: ārambhasattā gaḍhiyā ya loe | dhammaṃ na jāṇanti vimokkhaheuṃ
text.1066: puḍho ya chandā iha māṇavā u | kiriyākirīyaṃ ca puḍho ya vāyaṃ /
text.1067: jāyassa bālassa pakuvva dehaṃ | pavaḍḍhaī veram asaṃjayassa
text.1068: āukkhayaṃ ceva abujjhamāṇe | mamāi se sāhasakāri mande /
text.1069: aho ya rāo paritappamāṇe | aesu mūḍhe ajarāmare vva
text.1070: jahāhi vittaṃ pasavo ya savvaṃ | je bandhavā je ya piyā ya mittā /
text.1071: lālappaī se vi ya ei mohaṃ | anne jaṇā taṃsi haranti vittaṃ
text.1072: sīhaṃ jahā khuḍḍamigā carantā | dūre caranti parisaṃkamāṇā /
text.1073: evaṃ tu mehāvi samikkha dhammaṃ | dūreṇa pāvaṃ parivajjaejjā
text.1074: saṃbujjhamāṇe u nare maīmaṃ | pāvāu appāṇa nivaaejjā /
text.1076: musaṃ na būyā muṇi attagāmī | nivvāṇam eyaṃ kasiṇaṃ samāhiṃ /
text.1077: sayaṃ na kujjā na ya kāravejjā | karantam annaṃ pi ya nāṇujāṇe
text.1078: suddhe siyā jāe na dūsaejjā | amucchie na ya ajjhovavanne /
text.1079: dhiimaṃ vimukke na ya pūyaṇaṭhī | na siloyagāmī ya parivvaejjā
text.1080: nikkhamma gehāu nirāvakaṃkhī | kāyaṃ viussejja niyāṇachinne /
text.1081: no jīviyaṃ no maraṇābhikaṃkhī | carejja bhikkhū valayā vimukke  tti bemi ||
text.1085: jaṃ maggaṃ ujju pāvittā | ohaṃ tarai duttaraṃ
text.1087: jāṇāsi -aṃ jahā bhikkhū | taṃ -o būhi mahāmuṇī
text.1088: jai -o kei pucchijjā | devā aduva māṇusā /
text.1089: tesiṃ tu kayaraṃ maggaṃ | āikkhejja kahāhi -o
text.1090: jai vo kei pucchijjā | devā aduva māṇusā /
text.1093: jam āyāya io puvvaṃ | samuddaṃ vavahāriṇo
text.1095: taṃ soccā paḍivakkhāmi | jantavo taṃ suṇeha me
text.1098: ahāvarā tasā pāṇā | evaṃ chakkāya āhiyā /
text.1101: savve akkantadukkhā ya | ao savve na hiṃsayā
text.1102: eyaṃ khu nāṇiṇo sāraṃ | jaṃ na hiṃsai kaṃcaṇa /
text.1104: uḍḍhaṃ ahe ya tiriyaṃ | je kei tasathāvarā /
text.1105: savvattha viraiṃ vijjā | santi nivvāṇam āhiyaṃ
text.1106: pabhū dose nirākiccā | na virujjhejja keṇa vi /
text.1107: maṇasā vayasā ceva | kāyasā ceva antaso
text.1108: saṃvuḍe se mahāpanne | dhīre dattesaṇaṃ care /
text.1110: bhūyāiṃ ca samārambha | tam uddissā ya jaṃ kaḍaṃ /
text.1111: tārisaṃ tu na giṇhejjā | annapāṇaṃ susaṃjae
text.1112: pūīkammaṃ na sevejjā | esa dhamme vusīmao /
text.1113: jaṃ kiṃci abhikaṃkhejjā | savvaso taṃ na kappae
text.1115: ṭhāṇāiṃ santi saḍḍhīṇaṃ | gāmesu nagaresu vā
text.1116: tahā giraṃ samārabbha | atthi puṇṇaṃ ti no vae /
text.1117: ahavā natthi puṇṇaṃ ti | evam eyaṃ mahabbhayaṃ
text.1118: dāṇaṭhayā ya je pāṇā | hammanti tasathāvarā /
text.1119: tesiṃ sārakkhaṇaṭhāe | tamhā atthi tti no vae
text.1121: tesiṃ lābhantarāyaṃ ti | tamhā natthi tti no vae
text.1122: je ya dāṇaṃ pasaṃsanti | vaham icchanti pāṇiṇaṃ /
text.1123: je ya -aṃ paḍisehanti | vitticcheyaṃ karanti te
text.1124: duhao vi te na bhāsanti | atthi vā natthi vā puṇo /
text.1125: āyaṃ rayassa heccā -aṃ | nivvāṇaṃ pāuṇanti te
text.1126: nivvāṇaṃ paramaṃ buddhā | nakkhattāṇa va candimā /
text.1127: tamhā sayā jae dante | nivvāṇaṃ saṃdhae muṇī
text.1129: āghāi sāhu taṃ dīvaṃ | paiṭhesā pavuccaī
text.1131: je dhammaṃ suddham akkhāi | paḍipuṇṇam aṇelisaṃ
text.1133: buddhā mo tti ya mannantā | anta ee samāhie
text.1134: te ya bīyodagaṃ ceva | tam uddissā ya jaṃ kaḍaṃ /
text.1136: jahā ḍhaṃkā ya kaṃkā ya | kulalā maggukā sihī /
text.1138: evaṃ tu samaṇā ege | micchadiṭhī aṇāriyā /
text.1140: suddhaṃ maggaṃ virāhittā | ihamege u dummaī /
text.1141: ummaggagayā dukkhaṃ | ghāyam esanti taṃ tahā
text.1144: evaṃ tu samaṇā ege | micchaddiṭhī aṇāriyā /
text.1146: imaṃ ca dhammam āyāya | kāsaveṇa paveiyaṃ /
text.1148: virae gāmadhammehiṃ | je kei jagaī jagā /
text.1150: aimāṇaṃ ca māyaṃ ca | taṃ parinnāya paṇḍie /
text.1151: savvam eyaṃ nirākiccā | nivvāṇaṃ saṃdhae muṇī
text.1153: uvahāṇavīrie bhikkhū | kohaṃ māṇaṃ na patthae
text.1154: je ya buddhā atikkantā | je ya buddhā aṇāgayā /
text.1155: santi tesiṃ paiṭhāṇaṃ | bhūyāṇaṃ jagaī jahā
text.1156: aha -aṃ vayam āvannaṃ | phāsā uccāvayā phuse /
text.1157: na tesu viṇihaṇṇejjā | vāeṇa va mahāgirī
text.1158: saṃvuḍe se mahāpanne | dhīre dattesaṇaṃ care /
text.1159: nivvuḍe kālamākaṃkhī | evaṃ kevaliṇo mayaṃ  ti bemi ||
text.1162: cattāri samosaraṇāṇimāni | pāvāduyā jāiṃ puḍho vayanti /
text.1163: kiriyaṃ akiriyaṃ viṇayaṃ ti taiyaṃ | annāṇam āhaṃsu cauttham eva
text.1164: annāṇiyā tā kusalā vi santā | asaṃthuyā no vitigicchatiṇṇā /
text.1165: akoviyā āhu akoviyehiṃ | aṇāṇuvīittu musaṃ vayanti
text.1166: saccaṃ asaccaṃ iti cintayantā | asāhu sāhu tti udāharantā /
text.1167: jeme jaṇā veṇaiyā aṇege | puṭhā vi bhāvaṃ viṇaiṃsu nāma
text.1168: aṇovasaṃkhā ii te udāhu | aṭhe sa obhāsai amha evaṃ /
text.1169: lavāvasaṃkī ya aṇāgaehiṃ | no kiriyam āhaṃsu akiriyavāī
text.1170: saṃmissabhāvaṃ ca girā gahīe | se mummuī hoi aṇāṇuvāī /
text.1171: imaṃ dupakkhaṃ imam egapakkhaṃ | āhaṃsu chalāyayaṇaṃ ca kammaṃ
text.1172: te evam akkhanti abujjhamāṇā | virūvarūvāṇi akiriyavāī /
text.1173: je māyaittā bahave maṇūsā | bhamanti saṃsāramaṇovadaggaṃ
text.1174: nāicco udei na atthamei | na candimā vaḍḍhai hāyaī vā /
text.1175: salilā na sandanti na vanti vāyā | vañjho niyao kasiṇe hu loe
text.1176: jahā hi andhe saha joiṇā vi | rūvāiṃ no passai hīṇanette /
text.1177: santaṃ pi te evam akiriyavāī | kiriyaṃ na passanti niruddhapannā
text.1178: saṃvaccharaṃ suviṇaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ca | nimittadehaṃ ca uppāiyaṃ ca /
text.1179: aṭhaṅgam eyaṃ bahave ahittā | logaṃsi jāṇanti aṇāgayāiṃ
text.1180: keī nimittā tahiyā bhavanti | kesiṃci taṃ vippaḍiei nāṇaṃ /
text.1181: te vijjabhāvaṃ aṇahijjamāṇā | āhaṃsu vijjāparimokkham eva
text.1182: te evam akkhanti samicca logaṃ | tahā tahā samaṇā māhaṇā ya /
text.1183: sayaṃkaḍaṃ nannakaḍaṃ ca dukkhaṃ | āhaṃsu vijjācaraṇaṃ pamokkhaṃ
text.1184: te cakkhu logaṃsiha nāyagā u | maggāṇusāsanti hiyaṃ payāṇaṃ /
text.1185: tahā tahā sāsayam āhu loe | jaṃsī payā māṇava saṃpagāḍhā
text.1186: je rakkhasā vā jamaloiyā vā | je vā surā gaṃdhavvā ya kāyā /
text.1187: āgāsagāmī ya puḍhosiyā je | puṇo puṇo vippariyāsuventi
text.1188: jam āhu ohaṃ salilaṃ apāragaṃ | jāṇāhi -aṃ bhavagahaṇaṃ dumokkhaṃ /
text.1189: jaṃsī visaṇṇā visayaṅgaṇāhiṃ | duhao vi loyaṃ aṇusaṃcaranti
text.1190: na kammuṇā kamma khaventi bālā | akammuṇā kamma khaventi dhīrā /
text.1191: mehāviṇo lobhabhayāvaīyā | saṃtosiṇo no pakarenti pāvaṃ
text.1192: te tīyauppannam aṇāgayāiṃ | logassa jāṇanti tahāgayāiṃ /
text.1193: neyāro annesi aṇannaneyā | buddhā hu te antakaḍā bhavanti
text.1194: te neva kuvvanti na kāraventi | bhūyāhisaṃkāi duguñchamāṇā /
text.1195: sayā jayā vippaṇamanti dhīrā | vinnatti dhīrā ya havanti ege
text.1196: ḍahare ya pāṇe vuḍḍhe ya pāṇe | te attao pāsai savvaloe /
text.1197: uvvehaī logam iṇaṃ mahantaṃ | buddhepamattesu parivvaejjā
text.1198: je āyao parao vā vi naccā | alam appaṇo honti alaṃ paresiṃ /
text.1199: taṃ joibhūyaṃ ca sayāvasejjā | je pāukujjā aṇuvīi dhammaṃ
text.1200: attāṇa jo jāṇai jo ya logaṃ | gaiṃ ca jo jāṇai nāgaiṃ ca /
text.1201: jo sāsayaṃ jāṇa asāsayaṃ ca | jāiṃ ca maraṇaṃ ca jaṇovavāyaṃ
text.1202: aho vi sattāṇa viuaṇa ca | jo āsavaṃ jāṇai saṃvaraṃ ca /
text.1203: dukkhaṃ ca jo jāṇai nijjaraṃ ca | so bhāsium arihai kiriyavāyaṃ
text.1204: saddesu rūvesu asajjamāṇe | gandhesu rasesu adussamāṇe /
text.1205: no jīviyaṃ no maraṇāhikaṃkhī | āyāṇagutte valayā vimukke  tti bemi ||
text.1208: āhattahīyaṃ tu paveyaissaṃ | nāṇappakāraṃ purisassa jāyaṃ /
text.1209: sao ya dhammaṃ asao asīlaṃ | santiṃ asantiṃ karissāmi pāuṃ
text.1210: aho ya rāo ya samuṭhiehiṃ | tahāgaehiṃ paḍilabbha dhammaṃ /
text.1211: samāhim āghāyam ajosayantā | satthāram eva pharusaṃ vayanti
text.1212: visohiyaṃ te aṇukāhayante | je āyabhāveṇa viyāgarejjā /
text.1213: aṭhāṇie hoi bahūguṇāṇa | je nāṇasaṃkāi musaṃ vaejjā
text.1214: je yāvi puṭhā paliuñcayanti | āyāṇam aṭhaṃ khalu vañcaittā /
text.1215: asāhuṇo te iha sāhumāṇī | māyaṇṇi essanti aṇantaghāyaṃ
text.1216: je kohaṇe hoi jayaṭhabhāsī | viosiyaṃ je u udīraejjā /
text.1217: andhe va se daṇḍapahaṃ gahāya | aviosie dhāsai pāvakammī
text.1218: je viggahīe annāyabhāsī | na se same hoi ajhañjhapatte /
text.1219: ovāyakārī ya hirīmaṇe ya | egantadiṭhī ya amāirūve
text.1220: se pesale suhume purisajāe | jaccannie ceva suujjuyāre /
text.1221: bahuṃ pi aṇusāsie je tahaccā | same hu se hoi ajhañjhapatte
text.1222: je yāvi appaṃ vasumaṃ ti mattā | saṃkhāya vāyaṃ aparikkha kujjā /
text.1223: taveṇa vāhaṃ sahiu tti mattā | annaṃ jaṇaṃ passai bimbabhūyaṃ
text.1224: egantakūḍeṇa u se palei | na vijjaī moṇapayaṃsi gotte /
text.1226: je māhaṇe khattiyajāyae vā | tahuggaputte taha lecchaī vā /
text.1227: je pavvaīe paradattabhoī | gotte na je thabbhai māṇabaddhe
text.1228: na tassa jāī va kulaṃ va tāṇaṃ | nannattha vijjācaraṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ /
text.1229: nikkhamma se sevai gārikammaṃ | na se pārae hoi vimoyaṇāe
text.1230: nikkiṃcaṇe bhikkhu sulūhajīvī | je gāravaṃ hoi silogakāmī /
text.1231: ājīvam eyaṃ tu abujjhamāṇo | puṇo puṇo vippariyāsuventi
text.1232: je bhāsavaṃ bhikkhu susāhuvāī | paḍihāṇavaṃ hoi visārae ya /
text.1233: āgāḍhapanne suvibhāviyappā | annaṃ jaṇaṃ pannayā parihavejjā
text.1234: evaṃ na se hoi samāhipatte | je pannavaṃ bhikkhu viukkasejjā /
text.1235: ahavā vi je lāhamayāvalitte | annaṃ jaṇaṃ khiṃsai bālapanne
text.1236: pannāmayaṃ ceva tavomayaṃ ca | ninnāmae goyamayaṃ ca bhikkhū /
text.1237: ājīvagaṃ ceva cauttham āhu | se paṇḍie uttamapoggale se
text.1238: mayāiṃ eyāiṃ vigiñca dhīrā | na tāṇi sevanti sudhīradhammā /
text.1239: te savvagottāvagayā mahesī | uccaṃ agottaṃ ca gatiṃ vayanti
text.1240: bhikkhū muyacce taha diṭhadhamme | gāmaṃ ca nagaraṃ ca aṇuppavissā /
text.1241: se esaṇaṃ jāṇam aṇesaṇaṃ ca | annassa pāṇassa aṇāṇugiddhe
text.1242: araiṃ raiṃ ca abhibhūya bhikkhū | bahūjaṇe vā taha egacārī /
text.1243: egantamoṇeṇa viyāgarejjā | egassa janto gairāgaī ya
text.1244: sayaṃ sameccā aduvā vi soccā | bhāsejja dhammaṃ hiyayaṃ payāṇaṃ /
text.1245: je garahiyā saṇiyāṇappaogā | na tāṇi sevanti sudhīradhammā
text.1246: kesiṃci takkāi abujjha bhāvaṃ | khuddaṃ pi gacchejja asaddahāṇe /
text.1247: āussa kālāiyāraṃ vaghāe | laddhāṇumāṇe ya paresu aṭhe
text.1248: kammaṃ ca chandaṃ ca vigiñca dhīre | viṇaijja ū savvau āyabhāvaṃ /
text.1249: rūvehi luppanti bhayāvahehiṃ | vijjaṃ gahāyā tasathāvarehiṃ
text.1250: na pūyaṇaṃ ceva siloyakāmī | piyam appiyaṃ kassai no karejjā /
text.1251: savve aṇaṭhe parivajjayante | aṇāule yā akasāi bhikkhū
text.1252: āhattahīyaṃ samupehamāṇe | savvehi pāṇehi nihāya daṇḍaṃ /
text.1253: no jīviyaṃ no maraṇāhikaṃkhī | parivvaejjā valayā vimukke  tti bemi ||
text.1256: ganthaṃ vihāya iha sikkhamāṇo | uṭhāya subambhaceraṃ vasejjā /
text.1257: ovāyakārī viṇayaṃ susikkhe | je cheya se vippamāyaṃ na kujjā
text.1258: jahā diyāpoyam apattajāyaṃ | sāvāsagā paviuṃ mannamāṇaṃ /
text.1259: tam acāiyaṃ taruṇam apattajāyaṃ | ḍhaṃkāi avvattagamaṃ harejjā
text.1260: evaṃ tu sehaṃ pi apuṭhadhammaṃ | nissāriyaṃ vusimaṃ mannamāṇā /
text.1261: diyassa chāyaṃ va apattajāyaṃ | hariṃsu -aṃ pāvadhammā aṇege
text.1262: osāṇam icche maṇue samāhiṃ | aṇosie -antakariṃ ti naccā /
text.1263: obhāsamāṇe daviyassa vittaṃ | na nikkase bahiyā āsupanno
text.1264: je ṭhāṇao ya sayaṇāsaṇe ya | parakkame yāvi susāhujutte /
text.1265: samiīsu guttīsu ya āyapanne | viyāgariṃ te ya puḍho vaejjā
text.1266: saddāṇi soccā adu bheravāṇi | aṇāsave tesu parivvaejjā /
text.1267: niddaṃ ca bhikkhū na pamāya kujjā | kahaṃkahaṃ vā vitigicchatiṇṇe
text.1269: sammaṃ tayaṃ thirao nābhigacche | nijjantae vāvi apārae se
text.1270: viuṭhieṇaṃ samayāṇusiṭhe | ḍahareṇa vuḍḍheṇa u coie ya /
text.1271: accuṭhiyāe ghaḍadāsie vā | agāriṇaṃ vā samayāṇusiṭhe
text.1272: na tesu kujjhe na ya pavvahejjā | na yāvi kiṃcī pharusaṃ vaejjā /
text.1273: tahā karissaṃ ti paḍissuṇejjā | seyaṃ khu meyaṃ na pamāya kujjā
text.1274: vaṇaṃsi mūḍhassa jahā amūḍhā | maggāṇusāsanti hiyaṃ payāṇaṃ /
text.1275: teṇeva majjhaṃ iṇam eva seyaṃ | jaṃ me buhā samaṇusāsayanti
text.1276: aha teṇa mūḍheṇa amūḍhagassa | kāyavva pūyā savisesajuttā /
text.1277: eovamaṃ tattha udāhu vīre | aṇugamma atthaṃ uvaṇei sammaṃ
text.1278: neyā jahā andhakāraṃsi rāo | maggaṃ na jāṇāi apassamāṇe /
text.1279: se sūriyassa abbhuggameṇaṃ | maggaṃ viyāṇāi pagāsiyaṃsi
text.1280: evaṃ tu sehe vi apuṭhadhamme | dhammaṃ na jāṇāi abujjhamāṇe /
text.1281: se kovie jiṇavayaṇeṇa pacchā | sūrodae pāsai cakkhuṇeva
text.1282: uḍḍhaṃ ahe yaṃ tiriyaṃ disāsu | tasā ya je thāvara je ya pāṇā /
text.1283: sayā jae tesu parivvaejjā | maṇappaosaṃ avikampamāṇe
text.1284: kāleṇa pucche samiyaṃ payāsu | āikkhamāṇo daviyassa vittaṃ /
text.1285: taṃ soyakārī ya puḍho pavese | saṃkhā imaṃ kevaliyaṃ samāhiṃ
text.1286: asmiṃ suṭhiccā tiviheṇa tāyī | eesu yā santi niroham āhu /
text.1287: te evam akkhanti tilogadaṃsī | na bhujjameyanti pamāyasaṃgaṃ
text.1288: nisamma se bhikkhu samīhiyaṭhaṃ | paḍibhāṇavaṃ hoi visārae ya /
text.1289: āyāṇaaṭhī vodāṇamoṇaṃ | uvecca suddheṇa uvei mokkhaṃ
text.1290: saṃkhāi dhammaṃ ca viyāgaranti | buddhā hu te antakarā bhavanti /
text.1291: te pāragā doṇha vi moyaṇāe | saṃsodhiyaṃ paṇham udāharanti
text.1292: no chāyae no vi ya lūsaejjā | māṇaṃ na sevejja pagāsaṇaṃ ca /
text.1293: na yāvi panne parihāsa kujjā | na yāsiyāvāya viyāgarejjā
text.1294: bhūyābhisaṃkāi duguñchamāṇe | na nivvahe mantapaeṇa goyaṃ /
text.1295: na kiṃcim icche maṇue payāsuṃ | asāhudhammāṇi na saṃvaejjā
text.1296: hāsaṃ pi no saṃdhai pāvadhamme | oe taīyaṃ pharusaṃ viyāṇe /
text.1297: no tucchae no ya vikaṃthaijjā | aṇāile yā akasāi bhikkhū
text.1298: saṃkejja yāsaṃkiyabhāva bhikkhū | vibhajjavāyaṃ ca viyāgarejjā /
text.1300: aṇugacchamāṇe vitahaṃ vijāṇe | tahā tahā sāhu akakkaseṇaṃ /
text.1301: na katthaī bhāsa vihiṃsaijjā | niruddhagaṃ vā vi na dīhaijjā
text.1303: āṇāi suddhaṃ vayaṇaṃ bhiuñje | abhisaṃdhae pāvavivega bhikkhū
text.1305: se diṭhimaṃ diṭhi na lūsaejjā | se jāṇai bhāsiuṃ taṃ samāhiṃ
text.1306: alūsae no pacchannabhāsī | no suttam atthaṃ ca karejja tāī /
text.1307: satthārabhattī aṇuvīi vāyaṃ | suyaṃ ca sammaṃ paḍivāyayanti
text.1308: se suddhasutte uvahāṇavaṃ ca | dhammaṃ ca je vindai tattha tattha /
text.1309: āejjavakke kusale viyatte | sa arihai bhāsiuṃ taṃ samāhiṃ  ti bemi ||
text.1315: aṇelisassa akkhāyā | na se hoi tahiṃ tahiṃ
text.1316: tahiṃ tahiṃ suyakkhāyaṃ | se ya sacce suāhie /
text.1317: sayā sacceṇa saṃpanne | mettiṃ bhūehi kappae
text.1318: bhūehi na virujjhejjā | esa dhamme vusīmao /
text.1322: tiuaī u mehāvī | jāṇaṃ logaṃsi pāvagaṃ /
text.1324: akuvvao navaṃ natthi | kammaṃ nāma vijāṇai /
text.1325: vinnāya se mahāvīre | jeṇa jāī na mijjaī
text.1326: na mijjaī mahāvīre | jassa natthi purekaḍaṃ /
text.1327: vāu vva jālam accei | piyā logaṃsi itthiyo
text.1328: itthiyo je na sevanti | āimokkhā hu te jaṇā /
text.1330: jīviyaṃ piṭhao kiccā | antaṃ pāvanti kammuṇaṃ /
text.1332: aṇusāsaṇaṃ puḍho pāṇī | vasumaṃ pūyaṇāsu te /
text.1334: nīvāre va na līejjā | chinnasoe aṇāvile /
text.1335: aṇāile sayā dante | saṃdhiṃ patte aṇelisaṃ
text.1337: maṇasā vayasā ceva | kāyasā ceva cakkhumaṃ
text.1338: se hu cakkhū maṇussāṇaṃ | je kaṃkhāe ya antae /
text.1339: anteṇa khuro vahaī | cakkaṃ anteṇa loṭhaī
text.1340: antāṇi dhīrā sevanti | teṇa antakarā iha /
text.1341: iha māṇussae ṭhāṇe | dhammam ārāhiuṃ narā
text.1342: niṭhiyaṭhā va devā vā | uttarīe iyaṃ suyaṃ /
text.1343: suyaṃ ca meyam egesiṃ | amaṇussesu no tahā
text.1348: je dhammaṃ suddham akkhanti | paḍipuṇṇam aṇelisaṃ /
text.1349: aṇelisassa jaṃ ṭhāṇaṃ | tassa jammakahā kao
text.1352: aṇuttare ya ṭhāṇe se | kāsaveṇa paveie /
text.1353: jaṃ kiccā nivvuḍā ege | niṭhaṃ pāvanti paṇḍiyā
text.1355: dhuṇe puvvakaḍaṃ kammaṃ | navaṃ vā vi na kuvvaī
text.1357: rayasā saṃmuhībhūyā | kammaṃ heccāṇa jaṃ mayaṃ
text.1358: jaṃ mayaṃ savvasāhūṇaṃ | taṃ mayaṃ sallagattaṇaṃ /
text.1359: sāhaittāṇa taṃ tiṇṇā | devā vā abhaviṃsu te
text.1360: abhaviṃsu purā dhīrā | āgamissā vi suvvayā /
text.1361: dunnibohassa maggassa | antaṃ pāukarā tiṇṇe  tti bemi ||
text.1364: ahāha bhagavaṃṇṇevaṃ se dante davie vosaṭhakāe tti vacce māhaṇe
text.1365: tti vā 1 samaṇe tti vā 2 bhikkhu tti vā 3 nigganthe tti vā 4 |
text.1366: paḍiāha-bhante kahaṃ nu dante davie vosaṭhakāe tti vacce māhaṇe tti vā
text.1367: samaṇe tti vā bhikkhu tti vā nigganthe tti vā | taṃ no būhi mahāmuṇī ||
text.1368: iti virae savvapāvakammehiṃ pijjadosakalaha abbhakkhāṇa pesunna
text.1369: paraparivāya arairai māyāmosa micchādaṃsaṇasallavirae samie sahie
text.1370: sayā jae no kujjhe no māṇī māhaṇe tti vacce
text.1371: ettha vi samaṇe anissie aṇiyāṇe āyāṇaṃ ca aivāyaṃ ca
text.1372: musāvāyaṃ ca bahiddhaṃ ca kohaṃ ca māṇaṃ ca māyaṃ ca lohaṃ ca pijjaṃ ca
text.1373: dosaṃ ca icceva jao jao āyāṇaṃ appaṇo paddosaheū tao tao
text.1374: āyāṇāo puvvaṃ paḍivirae pāṇāivāyā siā dante davie vosaṭhakāe
text.1376: ettha vi bhikkhū aṇunnae viṇīe nāmae dante davie vosaṭhakāe
text.1378: ṭhiappā saṃkhāe paradattabhoī bhikkhu tti vacce
text.1379: ettha vi nigganthe ege egaviū buddhe saṃchinnasoe susaṃjae susamie
text.1380: susāmāie āyavāyapatte viū duhao vi soyapalichinne dhammaṭhī
text.1381: dhammaviū niyāgapaḍivanne samiyaṃ care dante davie vosaṭhakāe nigganthe
text.1382: tti vacce  se evam eva jāṇaha jamahaṃ bhayantāro  tti bemi ||
